name: King Arthur Project
storyline: This story starts where Twin crystals saga ended. Cindy finally found the location of the Topaz crystal on Topaz island. While she was searching for it, Lara already collected three of the other crystals and brought them to Topaz island, where she also bought the hotel to cover her real plans of getting the crystal from Dark Clan. Cindy, Lara and Jean discuss the plan how to get to the last crystal, while Kurtis is watching over the hotel. They have to hurry, because the Dark clan already started to gather around the hotel. They somehow found out there are the remaining three crystals. The one who would have them all, would be able to get the ultimate power. Or so it is told.
summary: This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story and puzzles.
